title: General
stimulusHtml:
Student response can earn up to 4 points maximum. (1 point for each bullet; each contrast pair must include 1 bullet from prokaryote and 1 bullet from eukaryote)

  • Prokaryote: No introns
    Eukaryote: Introns

  • Prokaryote: Location: Not in nucleus
    Eukaryote: Location: nucleus (and Mito & Chloro)

  • Prokaryote: Circular
    Eukaryote: Linear

  • Prokaryote: No histones
    Eukaryote: Histones

  • Prokaryote: One chromosome, usually
    Eukaryote: >one chromosome, usually

  • Prokaryote: Plasmids common
    Eukaryote: Plasmids rare (yeast)

  • Prokaryote: Supercoiled DNA
    Eukaryote: Chromatin DNA
